verbs.description: Trump [V: is] pressing Beijing to narrow its politically volatile trade surplus with the United States , which reached a record $ 375.2 billion last year .
[ARG0: Trump] is [V: pressing] [ARG1: Beijing] [ARG2: to narrow its politically volatile trade surplus with the United States , which reached a record $ 375.2 billion last year] .
Trump is pressing [ARG0: Beijing] to [V: narrow] [ARG1: its politically volatile trade surplus with the United States , which reached a record $ 375.2 billion last year] .
Trump is pressing Beijing to narrow [ARG0: its politically volatile trade surplus with the United States] , [R-ARG0: which] [V: reached] [ARG1: a record $ 375.2 billion] [ARGM-TMP: last year] .
